General.Name: Feature Integration Technology Inc.
General.Description: Feature Integration Technology Inc. designs, markets, and commercializes ICs and controllers. It offers I/O controllers and I/F management products, such as eSPI/LPC/USB/PCIE I/F controllers; super hardware monitors + SIOs; hardware keyboard controllers; USB consumer IR receiver ICs for Windows Vista/Windows 7; power saving (EUP) SIOs and controllers; transceivers and buffers; SIOs with microcontrollers (uSIO); and bus controllers and transceivers. The company also provides environment sensors and glue logic ICs, including environment sensors and fan controllers, pure logic ICs, performance controllers, and real time clocks; power management and ACPI controllers, such as ACPI, switching, and multi-phase linear controllers; micro-processors; LED driver ICs; interface and connectivity products; and USB type-C and power delivery products, as well as USB fast charging products. It offers its IC products for various applications in personal computers, computer peripherals, digital consumer electronic products, and information appliance products. The company sells its products through professional IC distributors. Feature Integration Technology Inc. was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Zhubei, Taiwan.
